name: autoconect-switch-visibility
description:
Auto connect switch is visible when the user access the advance settings of a service

TODO : test case to be confirmed
pre_condition:
- At least Wifi or Ethernet technology is enabled
- User is connected to a service ?
- ConnMan UI is opened

steps.description: Double click on a service in the service field
steps.expected: A window appears with an advance menu

steps.description: Under the 'Details' option, check that auto connect switcher is visible
steps.expected: auto connect switcher is visible

author: zingile

name: autoconnect-switch-on
objective: Auto connection to a service can be enabled
description:
When the Auto connect switch is toggled on 'I' for a given service, user should be able to automatically connect this service, when it is available

TODO : test case to be confirm : services supposed to be auto connectable ? criteria to be able to toggle the switch button ?
pre_condition:
- User is connected to a service ?
- Auto connect mode is not enabled - switcher is toggled on 'O'
- ConnMan UI is opened

steps.description: Double click on the connected service
steps.expected: A window appears with an advance menu

steps.description: Under the 'Details' option, toggle the Auto connect switch
steps.expected: Auto connect switch is toggled on 'I'

steps.description: Disable the technology of the connected service
steps.expected: Services of this technology don't appear in the services field

steps.description: Enable the technology of the service
steps.expected: User automatically connects to this service

author: zingile

name: autoconnect-switch-off
objective: Auto connection to a service can be disabled
description:
When the Auto connect switch is toggled on 'O' for a given service, user should not be able to automatically connect this service, when it is available

TODO : test case to be confirm : services supposed to be auto connectable ? criteria to be
pre_condition:
- User is connected to a service ?
- Auto connect mode is enabled - switcher is toggled on 'O'
- ConnMan UI is opened

steps.description: Double click on the connected service
steps.expected: A window appears with an advance menu

steps.description: Under the 'Details' option, toggle the Auto connect switch
steps.expected: Auto connect switch is toggled on 'O'

steps.description: Disable the technology of the connected service
steps.expected: Services s technologyof thi don't appear in the services field

steps.description: Enable the technology of the service
steps.expected: User isn't automatically connected to this service

author: zingile

name: button-forget
description:
When user click on the 'Forget Network' button, when he is connected to a wireless service, credentials for this service are lost.

TODO : test case to be confirmed
pre_condition:
- User is connected to a secured wireless service 
- ConnMan UI is opened

steps.description: Double click on the connected wireless service in the service field
steps.expected: A window appears with an advance menu

steps.description: Under the 'Details' option, click on the 'Forget Network' button
steps.expected: User should disconnect from this service

steps.description: Try to connect to the same service
steps.expected: Password is required

author: zingile
